metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for AI-Native Product Teams

plugins.name: clarify
plugins.description: A skill that transforms ambiguous requirements into clear specifications

plugins.name: deep-clarify
plugins.description: A skill that autonomously researches requirements through codebase exploration and best practice analysis, only asking humans about genuinely subjective decisions

plugins.name: suggest-tidyings
plugins.description: A skill that suggests safe refactoring opportunities based on Kent Beck's Tidy First? philosophy

plugins.name: attention-hook
plugins.description: A hook that sends Slack notifications when Claude Code is waiting

plugins.name: interview
plugins.description: A skill that conducts structured interviews to extract requirements, constraints, and design decisions

plugins.name: retro
plugins.description: A skill that performs comprehensive session retrospectives with CDM analysis and expert lens

plugins.name: gather-context
plugins.description: Unified information acquisition: URL auto-detect (Google/Slack/Notion/GitHub/web), web search, and local codebase exploration

plugins.name: web-search
plugins.description: DEPRECATED â€” use gather-context v2 instead. Web search, code search, and URL content extraction via Tavily and Exa APIs

plugins.name: plan-and-lessons
plugins.description: A hook that injects the Plan & Lessons Protocol when entering plan mode

plugins.name: smart-read
plugins.description: A hook that enforces intelligent file reading based on file size

plugins.name: prompt-logger
plugins.description: A hook that auto-logs every conversation turn to markdown files for retrospective analysis
